about_the_game:
Explore a mysterious British village hiding a sinister secret, using extra-sensory abilities to unearth hidden truths and face supernatural threats

In Woodside, the importance of the clues you gather is yours to determine.
Connect the information to unravel a haunting history and confront the twisted remnants of the past as you try to survive in this chilling supernatural adventure.






Grace, a young woman with extra-sensory abilities, is drawn to Woodside after suffering terrifying and invasive nightmares about the village.

After setting out to investigate Woodside in an attempt to free herself from its grasp, Grace is faced with supernatural horrors as she struggles to reconcile with her abilities, her past and her future.




RICH EXPLORATION
  • Discover vital clues by interacting with the environment to learn more about Woodside and its history.
  • Navigate eerie locations in a detailed representation of rural England.
  • Follow vanishing spirits to unveil hidden areas and secrets lurking within the village.

Through exploration and investigation, you'll learn more about the people the entities you face used to be - discovering not only what made them monsters, but what made them human.



DEEP INVESTIGATION MECHANICS
In Woodside, YOU decide which information is important to your investigation.

Deep investigation mechanics give you the power to decide what information is important as you navigate the mysteries of the village.

  • Focus on elements of the environment that intrigue you. Grace’s intuition will log the clues you find.
  • Identify relationships between the clues you collect.
  • Cross-reference related clues to reveal new layers of information.



KNOWLEDGE IS POWER
Survive encounters by using your abilities to both defend against and connect and empathize with your enemies. The more you learn about the supernatural entities in Woodside, the greater your chances of survival.

FIRST-PERSON ENCOUNTERS
Confront spirits in heart-pounding first-person encounters, intensifying the immersive horror experience. When danger looms, shift into first-person Focus mode to harness Grace's abilities and overcome supernatural threats.



AN IMMERSIVE AND UNCANNY WORLD
  • Explore an atmospheric and visually immersive world through richly detailed, familiar, yet otherworldly, environments.
  • Discover an evocative and haunting original score that will stay with you long after you leave Woodside.
  • Grace is brought to life as a fully-voiced character.

name: Woodside

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660 GTX, Radeon HD 7950 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 980 GTX, Radeon RX 580 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Welcome to Woodside, a third-person survival horror adventure. Explore, investigate and survive as Grace as she comes face to face with the supernatural terrors that plague a seemingly quaint British village.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
